title: dasarathatmajam
sahitya:
dasarataatmajam - Santadamaham bajE shree 

(dasarataa)

 

anupallavi



tasamugaadi salapadeepam dayaambudam Sasarasaabam 

(dasarataa)

 

caraNam



daraNiSudaa SamaaslishTam paripoorida namada beeshTam

*varanavamaNi kasitahEma SimhaaSana SannilishTam 

(dasarataa)
